extensionDescription.message: Remove the '>' prefix from quote when you make a reply. To set options, click the [...] button in the upper right corner.

replytextLabel.message: Remove the '>' prefix from quote in text mail.

replyhtmlLabel.message: Remove the '|' prefix from quote in html mail.
